titles.title: A resolution recognizing the Los Angeles Lakers on their 2010 National Basketball Association Championship and congratulating the players, coaches, and staff for their outstanding achievements.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/23/2010--Introduced. Congratulates: (1) the Los Angeles Lakers for winning the 2010 National Basketball Association (NBA) Finals; (2) coach Phil Jackson for winning his 11th championship; and (3) the Boston Celtics for winning the NBA Eastern Conference Championship.
